body:
@josevalim The super's initializer might not have an argument.

So, if we call `super(params)` we get:

```shell
# Running tests:

......E......

Finished tests in 0.017178s, 756.7819 tests/s, 2037.4898 assertions/s.

  1) Error:
ModelTest#test_mixin_when_no_ancestors:
ArgumentError: wrong number of arguments (1 for 0)
    /Users/fredwu/Projects/ruby/rails/activemodel/lib/active_model/model.rb:83:in `initialize'
    /Users/fredwu/Projects/ruby/rails/activemodel/lib/active_model/model.rb:83:in `initialize'
    test/cases/model_test.rb:63:in `new'
    test/cases/model_test.rb:63:in `test_mixin_when_no_ancestors'

13 tests, 35 assertions, 0 failures, 1 errors, 0 skips
```
